ai-patthana17.21:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.21:0.3_0: doing what is good and wholesome.
ai-patthana17.21:1.1_3: Thoughts connected with pleasant feeling, skillful qualities don’t associate with pleasant feeling, or neutral feeling.
ai-patthana17.21:1.1_4: Thoughts connected with pleasant feeling, painful feeling, or neutral feeling conditioned by pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana17.21:1.1_5: Thoughts connected with pleasant feeling, painful feeling, or neutral feeling conditioned by pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana17.21:1.1_6: Pleasure feeling is not skillful, nor is conditioned by feeling. ...
ai-patthana17.21:2.1_0: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a pleasant feeling. It doesn’t give rise to painful feeling. Seven unskillful qualities is not a condition for the sake of producing condition. ...
ai-patthana17.21:2.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana17.21:6.1_0: Neutral feeling arises in someone who is skilled in neutral feeling ...
ai-patthana17.21:8.1_0: Pleasant feeling is a condition for feeling associated with it, not associated with it, producing the condition. It is a condition for feeling condition for the objection of thoughts.
ai-patthana17.21:8.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana17.21:9.1_1: At the time of Upavāṇa, there is no one hundred years.
ai-patthana17.21:9.1_2: Which is the root of painful feeling? And what is the basis for neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling?
